examples.example: 忙碌了一天后，我终于可以好好地休息一下了。

translate.english: After a busy day, I can finally have a good rest.

examples.example: 学习之余，适当的休息能让我们更好地迎接新的挑战。

translate.english: After study, proper rest can enable us to better meet new challenges.

examples.example: 经过紧张的工作后，大家都需要好好休息来恢复精力。

translate.english: After intense work, everyone needs a good rest to restore energy.
